                    For their 2022 Degrees of the Future, Gizmodo(opens in new window) released an article featuring the Computer Animation and Game Development Program here at CSU Chico as one one of the top ten in the country!We invite you to check out our Choose CAGD Page to see what makes our program unique and see why the Computer Animation and Game Development Program is right for you!Welcome to the Computer Animation and Game Development (CAGD) Program!
